name: @cowprotocol/cow-js
description: Gnosis Protocol JS integration: utils, contracts and other goodies

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:commonjs: rimraf build && ttsc && cp -r src/contracts/gen build/contracts/
scripts.build:esm: rimraf build-esm && ttsc -m esnext -t es2015 --outDir build-esm && cp -r src/contracts/gen build-esm/contracts/
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.contracts: rimraf "src/contracts/gen/*.d.ts" && npm run abi && npx typechain --target=web3-v1 --outDir src/contracts/gen "src/contracts/abi/*.json" && prettier --write src/contracts/gen/*.ts
